ingredients.ingredient: 1 (14 ounce) can EAGLE BRAND® Sweetened Condensed Milk
Finely chopped toasted nuts, flaked coconut, chocolate sprinkles, colored sprinkles, unsweetened cocoa, powdered sugar or colored sugars

cookingTips: Chill chocolate mixture for 2 hours before rolling into balls
Roll balls in coating immediately after scooping for best adherence
Store truffles in refrigerator for up to 2 weeks
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Which coating flavors appeal to you—nutty, coconut, or classic cocoa powder?
